sentences.en: A nuclear reactor is the apparatus in which atoms are split.
sentences.cn: 核反应堆是分裂原子的装置.

sentences.en: Don Corleone controls all that apparatus.
sentences.cn: 考利昂老头子把这一系统牢牢地掌握在乎中.

sentences.en: He would merely use his protective influence with the legal apparatus.
sentences.cn: 他仅仅利用一下自己在司法部门的后门和保护作用.

sentences.en: I nearly suffocated when the pipe of my breathing apparatus came adrift.
sentences.cn: 呼吸器上的管子脱落时,我差点给憋死.

sentences.en: Scientists might be amazed by the ingenious arrangement of the apparatus.
sentences.cn: 这种装置精巧的构造可能使科学家感到惊奇.

sentences.en: The apparatus thus described, however, records only the horizontal component of the wave movement.
sentences.cn: 然而, 仪器的如此描画只记录下波的运动的水平组成部分, 但是事实上波的运动要复杂得多(指不易解释).

sentences.en: The astronauts have special breathing apparatus.
sentences.cn: 宇航员有特殊的呼吸装置.

sentences.en: The breathing apparatus includes the nose, throat and lungs.
sentences.cn: 呼吸器官包括鼻 、 咽喉及肺.

sentences.en: The school's audio apparatus includes films and records.
sentences.cn: 学校的视听设备包括放映机和录音机.

sentences.en: The tax will require a massive administrative apparatus.
sentences.cn: 税收需要大规模的行政机构。

sentences.en: They had a very refined apparatus.
sentences.cn: 他们有一套非常精良的设备.

sentences.en: They lacked the scientific personnel to develop the technical apparatus much further.
sentences.cn: 他们缺少能够进一步研发这一技术装置的科研人员。

sentences.en: This apparatus scans patients'brains for tumours.
